General.Name: Shandong Huatai Paper Industry Shareholding Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Huatai Paper Industry Shareholding Co.,Ltd engages in the manufacture and sale of paper products in China. Its paper products include newsprint, cultural paper, coated paper, and packaging paper. The company also provides chemical products, such as caustic soda, liquid chlorine, hydrogen peroxide, propylene oxide, chloroacetic acid, aniline, etc. It also exports its products to Europe, the Americas, Southeast Asia, South Korea, India, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Shandong Huatai Paper Co., LTD. Shandong Huatai Paper Industry Shareholding Co.,Ltd was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Dongying, China.

8.Name: Mr. Ying Xiang  Ren
8.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the board
